general.gigTitle: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog

sellerCard.description: Five years of passion for Machine Learning, AI, Deep Learning, Mobile App Testing, and Website development. I am a WordPress developer who can take care of your website from scratch to the advanced stage, from theme customizations with unique features. I have worked for many people and companies. I have successfully built 250+ websites for all industries, from small and mid-level businesses to high-end companies. I'd love to chat with you. Please send me a message, and let's discuss your project!

description.content:
Looking for a modern & professional WordPress website design or WordPress redesign?


Search no further! With over 3+ years of design experience, I'm ready to create a stunning WordPress website that will bring your brand to life.


I offer WordPress expertise, cost-effective solutions, and excellent customer services at an affordable cost.


My portfolio covers various websites, including personal blog, portfolio site, sales/landing page, news agency, government, business, real estate/realtors, online store, university, doctors and portfolios & many more.


Services I Offer:


  • Design Professional Website
  • Pixel Perfect by Elementor Pro
  • Redesign Existing Website for Better Looks
  • Customized Unique Design Based on Your Busines
  • Fully Responsive (Mobile+Tablet+Desktop) Design
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • Setup Any Payment Gateway
  • SEO Friendly Structure & Speed Optimization
  • Slider, SVG Image and Animation Effect
  • Site Transfer to Another Domain or Hosting
  • Social Media Integration


Why Me:


  • 5 Years of Experience
  • Quick and Professional
  • Multiple Revisions
  • 30 Days Free Support


Be smart and make smart decisions! Why wait in a busy seller's order queue? Place an order today and enjoy premium services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'd need your WordPress hosting login and cPanel login credential to get started.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, All the pages are super responsive, mobile-friendly, and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer customer support after the delivery?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we offer help for 30 days as well as guide you on how to fix some simple WordPress issues.

questionsAndAnswers.question: If I'm not happy with your work or design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll try again and again, and I'll give my best to make you 100% Satisfied.

openGraph.title: do wordpress website development, design or redesign wordpress blog

reviews.comment: They were very patient with me and all of my questions and change requests in order to make my website and I also learned a lot about how Wordpress works and it’s advantages and disadvantages and how to work around it all. Great work on their part and thanks to them for being patient and helping me to create my blog website!

seller_response.comment: You’re the BEST. Loved working for you and look forward to working with you again one day! Wishing you all the success in the world. Thank you so much.

reviews.comment: This website was not anywhere close to what I originally described and did not fit my needs whatsoever. The complete lack of attention to not only the website but revealing my private information on my website was a complete mishandling and destroyed my trust in this relationship. The website provided will not be of any use to my needs as a blogger and there was very little effort in changing or using the description and examples I provided. I cannot recommend working with this vendor.

seller_response.comment: This review does not align with the product that we delivered to him. I am feeling really frustrated and sad about such a review after working so hard. As per the work process, I've made the modification according to the client client feedback. For some modifications, I've called the client to join a meeting (See the attached: https://prnt.sc/SCbArsB_D1XK). The client didn't join the meeting he said he would send the video(See the attached: https://prnt.sc/h-F8yvGb53de). But the client didn't send the video. After delivering the project he just sent me a single message(See the attached: https://prnt.sc/DdtzyHKIB7Tb). There was no misunderstanding with the client. But unfortunately, The client provides the review without any message. After following all the instructions accordingly, this type of review really downgraded my level of confidence and so on.

reviews.comment: The team managed to create an a website design faster than i expected them to finish. This was purely their design and i didn’t have to provide inputs as they are very professional

seller_response.comment: Your feedback means a lot to me, many thanks!

reviews.comment: Ended up with exactly what I wanted. Sohan was very responsive and provided instructions in a variety of formats using videos, links, copy and zoom. Highly recommend.

seller_response.comment: Thanks so much, Will look forward to doing more work for you!

reviews.comment: Sohan Islam is an exceptional web developer whose works was actually more than I expected. The response was always quick and polite and always willing to do what was asked. I could not recommend more highly and if I have further work needed, I will be calling upon them again.

seller_response.comment: It was a pleasure working with you, and I'm glad I could exceed your expectations. I truly appreciate your trust in my work, and I’d be happy to assist with any future projects. Looking forward to working together again!

reviews_snippet.comment: They were very patient with me and all of my questions and change requests in order to make my website and I also learned a lot about how Wordpress works and it’s advantages and disadvantages and how to work around it all. Great work on their part and thanks to them for being patient and helping me to create my blog website!
The team managed to create an a website design faster than i expected them to finish. This was purely their design and i didn’t have to provide inputs as they are very professional
Ended up with exactly what I wanted. Sohan was very responsive and provided instructions in a variety of formats using videos, links, copy and zoom. Highly recommend.

Sohan Islam is an exceptional web developer whose works was actually more than I expected. The response was always quick and polite and always willing to do what was asked. I could not recommend more highly and if I have further work needed, I will be calling upon them again.
